extracted-table.table-caption: Summary of significant results from whole-brain eLORETA comparisons between older and younger groups for alpha, beta2, and beta3 frequency bands.

caption.p: Summary of significant results from whole-brain eLORETA comparisons between older and younger groups for alpha, beta2, and beta3 frequency bands.

table-wrap-foot.p: Significant (p < 0.05) regions are indicated with the name of Brodmann area (BA) and MNI coordinates of the higher statistical two-tailed threshold (T) voxel.

extracted-table.table-caption: Pearson’s correlations between pain ratings and beta3 resting-state EEG current density in both groups.

caption.p: Pearson’s correlations between pain ratings and beta3 resting-state EEG current density in both groups.

table-wrap-foot.p: R values are shown. Notice that the p value after the Bonferroni correction is equal 0.01. **p < 0.01, ***p < 0.001. PHG, parahippocampal gyrus; ACC, anterior cingulate cortex.
